price: Lo ingresé en Mi misericordia, porque era uno de los justos.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā innahu mina al-ṣāliḥīna
